suppress.notes: file name: dependency-management-plugin-1.0.11.RELEASE.jar This is a false positive. No vulnerability found in this package https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/io.spring.gradle/dependency-management-plugin/1.0.11.RELEASE
All versions of this tool are affected. There is no mitigation for this. Kahpp use MockServer just in the test phase. https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2021-32827
Only the tomcat example application is effected.
